title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version, a bug has been observed where there is no popup menu in the Java editor ruler. This menu should allow the user to add breakpoints and marks, but it is not appearing.
OB: When a java editor is opened and the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is displayed.
EB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
